website_summaries.verdict: Though it's slow at two-sided scanning, the entry-level Epson DS-1630 is a capable and reliable document scanner for the price, and it comes with a robust software bundle.
pros: Includes document and contact management software
cons: Saving to searchable PDF could be faster

customer_reviews.title: Easily installed in 10 mins and up and running within ...
customer_reviews.text: Followed the advice of earlier reviews and ignored the worthless instructions and CD that came with the scanner and just went straight to the Epson website and downloaded the MAC 'document capture' software and drivers. Easily installed in 10 mins and up and running within 20 mins of opening box. With the right software settings it scans from the sheet feeder and outputs to my Brother WiFi printer so works effectively as a small volume photocopier. Document naming needs a bit of care but once done works with no issues. Good quality scans too. Overall a great scanner thank you Epson.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Martin J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: After almost a year of regular use, still works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the automatic feed facility. This is a seriously good scanner that is perfect if you have many multi page documents that require scanning. It is VERY quick and doesn’t jam at all. A very good home office investment
customer_reviews.author: R. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in February. Worked fine for 2 months. Has now stopped working and does not recognise computer it was previously connected to despite no changes. Amazon say I cannot return backseat 'return window has closed'. This is faulty and I am within my statutory rights to a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Chirag

customer_reviews.title: Not quite up to the job
customer_reviews.text: Scan quality is not great, even at 200dpi which gives good results on most other scanners, and the multiple page scan feature is tricky to manage. If you put in your next page too soon, it stops halfway through and says there is a jam. If you leave it too late, you miss the boat and have to add the page later. The software isn't great either. Overall, if you must have a portable scanner and your phone won't do, consider it, but if you can wait till you're home and have a proper one then I'd give this a miss.
customer_reviews.author: Cumbers

customer_reviews.title: Good low volume scanner with ADF
customer_reviews.text: Took a little effort to get set up correctly using the drivers downloaded from Epson. Once set up it is very easy to use and the auto document feed for standard A4 documents works well, with even larger stacks of two sided documents scanned quickly and smoothly. Have not tried it with other document sizes. Very lightweight so easy to move around and with a small footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Certainly not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: 1 year after I bought this portable scanner, it stopped working. I cant scan anything into pdf format. Even getting it to scan as a picture does not always work.
customer_reviews.author: Suneetha Raja

customer_reviews.title: Bloody fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! I am travelling around China for business most of my time and need to email documents to head office abroad...it was a nightmare to find a fax machine or ask the hotel to scan and copy me the documents so that I could email...this little devise is grate in every way.In minutes my job is done anywhere any time, as clear as you want it also saved me money on faxes etc and above all it is super portable.What can I say, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: I have found this very useful. My full size scanner has given up the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have found this very useful. My full size scanner has given up the ghost and this is perfect for the occasional times I need to scan something.
customer_reviews.author: Ceres

customer_reviews.title: Good Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Good scan quality but you can get a bit of lateral drift from time to time and it doesn't like some photographic papers. It is a quick scanner opposed to loading a flat bed scanner though.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Mac owners beware!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! The Document Capture software that adds a lot of features for this scanner DO NOT WORK with Mac OSX. Confirmed by Epson support. Works ok with Windows, but not Mac...
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work on wireless connection. Really difficult to set up and I’m no technophobe. Avoid and go with a different model. Seems like let down on software interface Shame because it could be a nice piece of kit if it worked
customer_reviews.author: Coops

customer_reviews.title: Although this is an expensive scanner - against other like scanners it's not that bad
customer_reviews.text: Although this is an expensive scanner - against other like scanners it's not that bad. I found it £23 cheaper on amazon than in Staples or PcWorld. Quality is fantastic and very portable. Fits into my handbag and has become a great aid for a consultant on the road in and out of meetings. Highly recommend it and comes with a lovely velvet pouch for safe keeping.
customer_reviews.author: Particular Person

customer_reviews.title: Amazon mis-selling DS 310
customer_reviews.text: Advertised on Amazon as being wireless and with batteries. WRONG!!!!! Requires mains power and if does not work via Wi-fi. Talk about mis-selling
customer_reviews.author: Godalming guy

customer_reviews.title: Top class scanner
customer_reviews.text: The Epson WorkForce DS-310 Portable scanner is a very nice scanner both in design and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would take a number of sheets. it ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would take a number of sheets. it may do but I'm still waiting for a response from Epson on line help two weeks on and therefore having to feed in and scan one sheet at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and easy to use - so much quicker than my flatbed Epson. I'm self employed and work at multiple locations so the fact that it's easy to transport with my laptop is a great feature - weighs next to nothing and the bag supplied with it is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Small, high quality, simple to use and set up. If you want a scanner for documentation this is your puppy. I would say its more for documents then it is for photo scanning. If you scan photos buy a full scanner. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant--fast--scanner with double sided scanning option.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant piece of kit -- Double sided scanning works a dream and very fast .
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner, had no problems with it on windows ...
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner, had no problems with it on windows 10. The laptop recognised when the scanner was connected so long as the scanner is connected first before turning on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Antony Tilt

customer_reviews.title: but other than that it's a quality item and i'm very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Has it's moments, whereby if you don't load it perfectly square it turns out blurred images, but other than that it's a quality item and i'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY PURNELL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great little scannner use it for work almost every day good clear documents when scanned
customer_reviews.author: c carter

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to use but fulfils the function and very small and light
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Macrae

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect product for my needs. Compact, portable, Mac compatible, USB powered, great quality scans, auto-upload. A brilliant product. Delivered the next day after I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Plug&play dead simple & ideal for on the move scans documents and JPEGs up to A4. Excellent value for money. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Paul Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: It works very well and it is easy to do. There is nothing I dislike so far I would recommend it to anyone that travels and needs a portable scanner.
customer_reviews.author: marita

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I have bought in years. Really simple to set up and operate, and does PDFs too.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Baker

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and what a great piece of kit, easy to set up and use, highly recommended if you travel allot like me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: It's ideal for someone on the road, documents, expenses, etc. It's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: thomas lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for e-office applications and those that travel all the time
customer_reviews.author: Dr Denis K. Koltsov

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month!
customer_reviews.text: This scanner was great while it worked. Now it just scans and the image is completely black. Wish I could send it back, but it failed just outside the 30 day window :(
customer_reviews.author: mcgeekgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small scanner mostly for business cards but occasionally for other documents. This can scan up to A4 and came with software for business cards which is adequate - not brilliant on cards with busy backgrounds or unclear text but it works well on most cards.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but rubbish old-fashioned software and bad support using Mac OS X El Capitan
customer_reviews.text: The device looks nice, and comes with a nice case, but it's software on the Mac is badly supported, and EPSON are a pain when looking to them for support. This scanner also doesn't work with my primary Mac, and has sometimes not worked with other Macs (no other problems with other devices on the same USB ports).
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Compatibility problems.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it would be a lovely little scanner if only it would work on my Windows 10 computer. But the Epson software doesn't work and so the scanner doesn't work. It may work on some Windows 10 computers but not mine, and I have a pretty standard setup.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Carlton

customer_reviews.title: bring it wherever you want
customer_reviews.text: very lightweight, usb powered (as announced). I can carry it in my bag everywhere. Software has lots of tweaks to improve scan quality. Soft installation takes some time, but scanner is good. Do color scans, paper auto-load. Remember, put the document face-down to scan.
customer_reviews.author: Adriano

customer_reviews.title: problematic trying to scan multiple pages
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is advertised as having a 25 page sheet feeder, which would indicate that you can scan 25 pages at a time. When loaded with only 10 pages it jammed up every couple of pages. It also says it is suitable for scanning up to 500 pages a day, which was another reason I bought it as I thought it would be user friendly. Unfortunately this was not the case, so I returned it and bought a different scanner.
customer_reviews.author: cls46

customer_reviews.title: setup impossible
customer_reviews.text: I will get there in the end but the instructions leave me high and dry half way through set up to my iphone. I have spent 90 minutes on it so far, armed with all the support pages docs. They seem to have not tested the docs with new users and assume knowledge I do not have. I have set up thousands of gadgets over the years. It will be easy when I know how.
customer_reviews.author: greatperformance

product_meta.title: Epson WorkForce DS-1630 Flatbed Scanner
product_meta.description:
Style Name:DS-1630 Flatbed Scanner

The Epson WorkForce DS-1630 combines a flatbed scanner with the convenience of a 50 page ADF (automatic document feeder). This makes it possible to scan more challenging documents such as books, passports and delicate items, whilst still quickly scanning in stacks of pages.

The small footprint of the scanner means that the DS-1630 fits into any environment, whether you are looking for a domestic scanner, in a customer facing workspace or need a high-quality office scanner.

Boost efficiency with a number of intelligent features. The DS-1630 is equipped with Epson’s Image Processing Technology, offering a number of smart colour and image adjustments including auto crop, skew correction, background and blank page removal. Long document mode makes it possible to scan over 3m of single-sided paper.

The DS-1630 boasts a scan speed of 25 pages per minute, making it one of the fastest amongst comparable scanners. With fast USB 3.0 connectivity, the speed is never slowed, even with scanning at 300dpi high resolution. Double-sided scanning capabilities saves time and boosts efficiency. Scan directly to server locations, the cloud or Microsoft SharePoint and create up to 30 scan jobs with the optional network panel.

Epson software included with the DS-1630 enables dual image output, meaning you can scan once and send to two different destinations. The DS-1630 also encourages easy scanning to folders, email, online storage accounts and more.



LEGAL DISCLAIMER
Product is sourced and shipped from the European Economic Area (EEA). Product is genuine original from manufacturer authorized distributors.

BOX CONTAINS
Main unit
Power cable
Setup guide
Software (CD)
USB cable
Warranty Documents

See more
feature_bullets: Versatile: Combines a flatbed scanner with 50-page automatic document feeder with the ability to scan a number of challenging documents such as books and passports
Small Footprint: The DS-1630's small footprint makes it perfect for any workspace, whether in an office space of customer-facing environment
Intelligent: With a range of colour and image adjustments, the Epson DS-1630 has the ability to auto crop, correct any skewing, and remove any blank pages or backgrounds
Fast: Scan speed of 25 pages per minute
USB 3.0: Fast connectivity ensures you're never slowed down, even when scanning at 300dpi high resolution

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars106 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
